name: compression
content:
compression noun [U]
(PRESS ON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of pressing something into a smaller space or putting pressure on it from different sides until it gets smaller: Tectonic forces caused compression in the earth’s crust. Compression fractures of the spine are common in older people. nerve compression

Becoming and making smaller or less
compression noun [U]
(MAKE SMALLER)
the act of making something smaller or shorter so that it will fit into a particular space or time

compression noun [U]
(COMPUTER)
the act of making a computer file use less space when it is stored, using special software: Advances in compression technology mean that you can now send even quite large files by email.
